About me

Hi, I'm Luke Grippa!

I have a Bachelors in Computer Engineering with minors in Computer Science and Cybersecurity.

I figured the best way to get a better understanding of this stuff is to write about it! So here you can find write-ups for CTF challenges, articles about certain topics and even quick notes about different things that I want to remember.

Goal of this blog:

  • Document what I learn.
  • Share knowledge that might help others.
